Steps? Which build?
Build 200403181131, but the exception should only be thrown if one of the
elements in the List is not an instance of the array type. Which is not the case
here. I even made a breakpoint on the call to List#toArray(..) and checked that
the expected rules where in. All the rules are instances of IRule, AFAIKS. Maybe
there was "something" out-of-sync (can't imagine, hotcode-replace?).
